short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official chrome extension for Pinboard, the minimalist bookmarking site. Lets you save bookmarks and tab sets easily from Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official extension for Pinboard, the beloved personal archive and bookmarking website. This is a fairly minimal extension that lets you save bookmarks and tab sets (a quick way to save browser state if you have a ton of open tabs), and provides convenience shortcuts to your Pinboard account.
